title: Project Details
description:
I'm looking for a skilled full stack web developer to create an e-commerce website using custom HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. 

Key Requirements:
- User Account Management: Enable users to create, manage, and customize their accounts.
- Chatbot Integration: Implement an AI-driven chatbot for customer support and interaction.
- Data Analytics Prediction Model: Develop a model to analyze user behavior and predict trends.

Ideal Skills & Experience:
- Strong expertise in HTML, CSS, and JS.
-strong command on frontend and backend 
- Experience in building robust e-commerce platforms.
- Proficiency in AI and data analytics.
- Previous work on user account management systems.

title: Project Details
description: Overview: We need a fast, responsive website where users can search for any “Top X” list (e.g. best restaurants, best AI tools, top marketing platforms, etc.). The system should automatically generate accurate results, but all results must also be editable by admins via a panel.  Frontend Requirements: Homepage with a search bar (e.g. “Best AI tools”) When users search, display a Top X list (X = adjustable number) Each result should include: Rank Name Short description Image/logo Link (optional) Fully responsive (mobile + desktop) SEO optimized Fast load time  Backend / Admin Panel: Admin login system Add/edit topics (e.g., “Top 10 Productivity Tools”) Add/edit items under each topic Set number of items shown (Top 3, 5, 10, etc.) Ability to toggle between: Auto mode (auto-generated results via API or scraping) Manual mode (admin-defined results)  Tech Preference: Platform: WordPress (preferred) Should include a custom admin panel or use plugins (ACF, Custom Post Types) Compatible with Elementor or similar page builder (if needed) project budget: 400 CAD MAX figma link: https://www.figma.com/design/9WqAkRMqxhGag6QPgHTc9d/Easy.best?node-id=0-1&t=DJYcTCEcuQaHK4XA-1

title: Project Details
description: We are building an application in which we fully integrate Open AI. For this project my team of programmers is looking for a highly skilled and very well experienced project manager who has tons of experience in managing Open AI projects.. Your job is to manage the project, supervise the team of programmers and designers and make Q & A and testing. Final testing will be done by the company owner to who the projects manager directly reports to.

title: Project Details
description:
Suvpriya Nexus Private Limited is looking for an experienced full-stack developer or team to build a powerful, AI-enabled ERP + CRM platform and a corporate website.

This is a board-approved project with a total budget of INR 1,00,000 (inclusive of GST).
We require strict adherence to the approved blueprint and milestone delivery.

Scope Includes:

ERP Modules:

Finance & Accounting

Inventory & Procurement

HRM (basic)

Project Management

Compliance Tracking

AI Analytics (basic KPIs & forecasting)


CRM Modules:

Lead & Contact Management

Sales Pipeline Tracking

Predictive Lead Scoring

Email/Chat Integration

Marketing Campaigns

Support Ticket System


Company Website:

Home, About, Services, CSR, Contact, AI Products

Mobile responsive, SEO-ready, CMS-backed


Technical Stack (Required):

Frontend: React.js

Backend: Django + FastAPI

Database: PostgreSQL + Redis

AI/ML: Python (TensorFlow, Scikit-learn)

Authentication: JWT + OAuth2

Hosting: AWS (EC2, RDS, S3)


Project Timeline: 4 Phases (120 days total)

ERP Core (45 days)

CRM Integration (30 days)

Website (30 days)

Testing & Deployment (15 days)


Milestones will be strictly monitored with source code reviews and demos.

Deliverables:

Full source code (GitHub)

Deployment on AWS

Documentation & basic user manual

Support during testing phase


Required Experience:

Proven expertise with Django and React

Prior work with ERP/CRM platforms

Familiarity with AI tools and cloud deployment

title: Project Details
description:
Project Overview:
I’m looking for an experienced full-stack developer to build a simple yet powerful AI-powered blog/article generation tool with an admin dashboard. The goal is to allow users to input a topic and get well-structured blog content generated using GPT (OpenAI API), which they can save, edit, and export.

Key Features:
 Frontend (User-Facing)
Simple, clean UI with form input for article topic/keywords

Output section to show AI-generated article

Option to edit and export article (PDF/Word)

Responsive design (mobile + desktop)

  Backend (Admin Dashboard)
Admin login & authentication

Manage user history (view, delete articles)

API usage tracking

User management & usage quota settings

  AI Integration
Use OpenAI API to generate high-quality blog articles

Adjustable tone and length (short, medium, long)

Deliverables:
Fully functional web app

Source code + deployment instructions

Documentation on how to use and manage the app

Ideal Freelancer:
Strong experience with Python (Flask/Django) & React or Vue

Familiar with OpenAI or GPT API integration

Skilled in building secure and scalable web apps

Good communication and ability to deliver clean, tested code

title: Project Details
description:
We are on the lookout for a skilled and innovative freelancer to collaborate on the creation and monetization of an exciting AI-powered YouTube or Cartoon channel. This project aims to leverage artificial intelligence to produce engaging and entertaining content, appealing to a wide audience.

Key Responsibilities:

Content Creation: Utilize AI technologies to generate captivating and original content for the YouTube or Cartoon channel. This may involve creating animated videos, developing unique characters, or employing AI algorithms to enhance storytelling.

Channel Design and Branding: Design an appealing visual identity for the channel, ensuring it aligns with the target audience and theme. This includes creating a recognizable logo, channel art, and maintaining a cohesive brand throughout the content.

Monetization Strategies: Develop effective strategies to monetize the channel, considering options such as ad revenue, sponsorships, merchandise, and other potential income streams. Implement and optimize monetization methods to maximize revenue.

Audience Engagement: Implement techniques to build and engage a loyal audience. This includes fostering community interaction, responding to comments, and developing a social media presence to promote the channel.

SEO Optimization: Utilize SEO best practices to optimize video titles, descriptions, and tags for improved discoverability on YouTube and other platforms.

Qualifications:

Proven experience in content creation, particularly in the realm of YouTube or animation.
Proficiency in AI technologies, with the ability to integrate AI into content creation processes.
Understanding of YouTube's monetization policies and experience implementing successful monetization strategies.
Strong design skills for creating visually appealing channel art and branding elements.
Excellent communication skills and a creative mindset.

Who to Apply:
If you are a talented freelancer with a passion for AI-driven content creation and channel monetization, we want to hear from you! Please submit your portfolio, a brief overview of your relevant experience, and a proposal outlining your approach to creating and monetizing the channel

I will share you channel link kindly check the videos and upload some more videos and make it monitize

title: Project Details
description:
I'm looking for an experienced web developer to create a professional and engaging web page for my artificial intelligence software solutions. The primary goal of this page is to showcase our innovative products and services.

Key Requirements:
- User-friendly interface
- High-quality visuals and graphics
- SEO optimization

Ideal Skills and Experience:

- Experience with SEO and mobile optimization
- Strong graphic design skills

- Portfolio of similar projects

Please provide samples of previous work and a brief outline of your approach. Looking forward to your bids!

title: Project Details
description:
I need to migrate my website from WordPress to Zoho Sites.

Ideal Skills and Experience:

- Strong understanding of website migration
- Attention to detail to preserve existing design and functionality

Please connect for website URL and analysis.

title: Project Details
description:
I need a Python program that implements an adversarial training framework to fine-tune GPT-3 for generating misinformation that evades AI text detectors.

Key Components:
- Generator Model: Uses prompts to create fake news.
- Detector Model: Classifies text as AI-generated or human-written.

Training Process:
- The generator uses PPO to minimize the detector's confidence in its classification.
- The detector is periodically retrained on increasingly deceptive texts to enhance its robustness.

Requirements:
- Proficiency in Python and machine learning
- Experience with reinforcement learning, particularly PPO
- Familiarity with language models, especially GPT-3
- Knowledge of adversarial training techniques

The final output should include:
- A robust AI misinformation generator
- A resilient detector trained on adversarial examples

Please provide tools and datasets for evaluating and improving detection systems.
